verses.1: Khris Jesu tawh i kipawlna hangin hong kipia ding nuntakna thu a gen dingin Pasianʼ deihna tawh Khris Jesuʼ sawltak nasep a sem dingin a hong kisawl keimah Paul in
verses.2: Ka it ka ta Timoti tungah lai ka hong khak hi. Pa Pasian le i Topa Khris Jesu in dikna, hehpihna le nopsakna thupha nang tungah hong tungsak tahen.
verses.3: A sun a zanin ka thungetna ah nang ka hong phawk tawntung a, ka pu ka pateʼ sep mah bangin kisuanna lungsim om het loin a na ka sep Pasian tungah ka lungdamna ka ko hi.
verses.4: Na khitui luannate phawk ka hih manin ka lung a dam theih nadingin nang tawh kimu nuamin a sun a zanin ka ngaihsun tawntung hi.
verses.5: Na pi Lois le na nu Eunis in a neih upna bangte pawl mah, lungsim takpi tawh na upna thu ka phawk a, tu-in zong nang sungah tua bang upna om hi, ci-in ka ngaihsun hi.
verses.6: Tua ahih manin nang tungah ka khut nga-in thu ka hong ngetsak lai-in nangma tungah Pasian in hong piak siamna na sosuah nadingin ka hong phawksak hi.
verses.7: Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in eite tungah meidawina lungsim hong guan lo a, thahatna, ki-itna, pumpi ki-uk zawhna lungsim hong guan hizaw hi.
verses.8: Tua ahih manin i Topaʼ thu gen nading thu ah ahi a, ama thu hangin thong a kia keima thu ah ahi zongin maizum het kei in. Pasian in nangma tungah thahatna hong pia ahih mah bangin Lungdamna Thu hangin thuakna ah zong a thuak nuam hizaw in.
verses.9: Eiteʼ sep zawhna hang hi loin ama ngimna sa bang leh a dikna hangin Pasian in eite hong hon khia-in ama mi dingin a hong sam hi. Pasian in leitung a pianmapekin Khris Jesu tungtawnin tua dikna a hong piak hi a,
verses.10: tu hun ciangin eite hong Honpa Khris Jesu tungtawnin a dikna hong langsak ta hi. Tua Jesu in sihna beisak a, lungdamna thu hangin sih nawn lohna thu a hong kilangsak hi.
verses.11: Hih a thak Lungdamna Thu hilhin a taangko ding le sawltak na a sem dingin kei a hong kikoih ahi hi.
verses.12: Tua ahih manin hih bang teng a thuak ka hi hi. Ahi zongin ka up pa ka thei a, ama tungah ka apte tua Ni dong hong kepsak zo ding hi, ci-in thei ka hih manin ka maizum het kei hi.
verses.13: Keima tung panin na zak sa a man thute zui inla, Khris Jesu tawh i kipawlna hangin i ngah upna le itna thu ah kip takin om in.
verses.14: Eite sungah a hong teeng Kha Siangtho in a hong ap thuhoihte limtakin kem in.
verses.15: Na theih sa bangin Asia gam sunga om mi khempeuh in kei hong nusia uh a, tuate lakah Figelas le Hermogenes te zong kihel uh hi.
verses.16: Onesiforas in tam veipi kei hong lungnuamsak ahih manin Pasian in a innkuan bupun hehpihna thupha pia tahen. Ka thongkiatna hangin amah maizum lo a,
verses.17: Rom khua hong tun ciangin kei hong muh matengin hong zong pah hi.
verses.18: Topa in tua Ni ciangin ama tungah hehpihna thupha pia tahen. Efesa khua ah ka om lai-in nakpi takin kei a hong huhnate khempeuh na theih sa ahi hi.
